plot: One day, New York City as we know it vanished overnight into a mysterious fog. Now known as Hellsalem's Lot, it has become a place where another world beyond imagining is connected to our reality. The balance within this new world is protected by a secret society known as Libra. Leo, a journalist and photographer who arrives in the city, is unexpectedly recruited to join their ranks.
ending_theme: "Sugar Song to Bitter Step" by UNISON SQUARE GARDEN
insert_song: "Catch Me If You Can" by Ai Ninomiya (ep 2)
